languages.name: HTML
languages.information: HTML is the standard markup language for creating web pages and web applications. It stands for HyperText Markup Language and is used to structure content on the web.

languages.name: CSS
languages.information: CSS is a stylesheet language used to control the presentation and layout of HTML documents. It stands for Cascading Style Sheets and is used to style web pages.

languages.name: JavaScript
languages.information: JavaScript is a high-level, interpreted programming language. It allows you to add dynamic and interactive elements to web pages, making them more engaging for users.

languages.name: React
languages.information: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces. It allows you to create reusable UI components and manage the state of your application efficiently.

languages.name: Vue
languages.information: Vue.js is a progressive JavaScript framework for building user interfaces. It focuses on the view layer and allows for easy integration with other projects.
